metadata.dc:author: Verdeguer, A
Ferris, J
Castel, V
García-Ibarra, F
Ribes, C
metadata.dc:description: We review 37 patients diagnosed of Wilms' tumor at the Clinica Infantil "La Fe", in the last ten years, looking at the misdiagnosed cases. In two children, histological study showed a multilocular renal cyst. We also report a case previously diagnosed as being a multicystic kidney; the histological study revealed, however, a cystic partially differentiated nephroblastoma. No case of extrarenal tumors was present in the misdiagnosed patients. We comment the difficulties to make a correct diagnosis when confronted with the above mentioned entities and before histological data are available.
metadata.dc:title: Errores diagnósticos en el nefroblastoma.
[Diagnostic errors in nephroblastoma].
